item.title: From Jacobi iteration to Krylov subspace method
item.description: Usually Krylov subspace methods are presented as separate category of iterative procedure from classic iterative methods based on splitting the system matrix.

item.title: Numerical analysis notes
item.description: Fixed point methods Definition From an approximation attempt based on the split of the matrix. General implementation Relation between fixed-point iteration and preconditioning.
